entry.title: CheatoOfficial/DiscordBatchGIFUploader: A lightweight JavaScript snippet that enables bulk-uploading and auto-favoriting GIF images directly within the Discord browser client. Conveniently skips files exceeding Discord's 10MB limit, uploads in batches of 10, and auto-favorites each GIF uploaded.
entry.content: A lightweight JavaScript snippet that enables bulk-uploading and auto-favoriting GIF images directly within the Discord browser client. Conveniently skips files exceeding Discord's 10MB limit, uploads in batches of 10, and auto-favorites each GIF uploaded.

entry.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
entry.content: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScriptâ€”making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. entry.title: trev-sykes/eip6963-wallet-connector: A simple, lightweight React component and hook for integrating Ethereum wallets using EIP-6963. Easily connect, disconnect, and manage wallet interactions with support for signer management, automatic wallet detection, and an intuitive UI component for seamless integration.
entry.content: A simple, lightweight React component and hook for integrating Ethereum wallets using EIP-6963. Easily connect, disconnect, and manage wallet interactions with support for signer management, automatic wallet detection, and an intuitive UI component for seamless integration.

entry.title: Saran1762/Github-Finder: GitHub Finder is a lightweight web application that allows users to search for GitHub profiles and view key details like profile information, repositories, and followers. Using GitHub's API, it provides a simple and intuitive way to explore developers on GitHub.
entry.content: GitHub Finder is a lightweight web application that allows users to search for GitHub profiles and view key details like profile information, repositories, and followers. Using GitHub's API, it provides a simple and intuitive way to explore developers on GitHub.
